name: Pinewood Valley Alpha Demo
description:
Pinewood Valley is a Single Player, First-Person Open World Horror. Set in 2006, you play a young male who returns to his hometown and finds the whole town has vanished or being killed by a group of unknown killers. You must Run, Hide or Fight to uncover what happened in Town of Pinewood Valley.

Alpha Demo: in this Demo you'll be placed in a residential area and nearby within the Town around 40 minutes into the full game, experience and explore the houses that wore once owned by the people that lived in the Town and meet a confused character along the way, while being hunted by terrifying killers, but the hunted can become the Hunter.

Minimum System Requirements:  Intel Core i5-4590/ AMD Ryzen 5 2600

Ram:4GB    Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390  DirectX: V10

Recommended System Requirements:  Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 7 3700x

Ram: 8GB    Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 DirectX: V12

This game uses UE5 with Lumen and Nanite.

Full Game Info

Open World: This game is open world, almost every building is explorable and highly detailed, Expect 5-8 hours of gameplay, where you will face new threats & familiar along the way.

Encounter Survivors: Your not the only one trying to survive in the Town, meet and interact with NPCs along the way who are trying to make it out alive.

Killer Line-up: Encounter many different killers throughout the story, each of them unique, but with the same driven goal; to kill you.
